content: Robo-Advisors STI ETF AMA The Fifth Person Savings Investments Asked by Wilson YeohAsked on 21 Feb 2019Hi, regarding dividend Investing. Would you recommend STI ETF, ROBO INVESTING or FSM MAPS?understand that STI ETF is for local market and the other is for global, which one would you recommend taking into consideration the fees, risk and dividend involved.1 answerAnswerBump1

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Feb 2019Hi,I will choose index ETF investing as it is the cheapest among all. You can look at STI ETF, Hang Sang ETF and the S&P 500 ETF.0 comments0
